name: places/ChIJaa-FkGP2wokRAeHNMqm281s
adrFormatAddress: 3507 Broadway, New York, NY 10031-5622, USA

originalText.text: Been here a few times, love it. Kim is super nice and does a great job. Fair prices that are pretty in line with other NYC cleaners. Reliable, thorough and fast.

text.text: Been here a few times, love it. Kim is super nice and does a great job. Fair prices that are pretty in line with other NYC cleaners. Reliable, thorough and fast.

originalText.text: Best around. Excellent dry cleaning (to get out many stains in my case) and excellent alterations. Great prices too. Very professional, convenient hours, and friendly.

text.text: Best around. Excellent dry cleaning (to get out many stains in my case) and excellent alterations. Great prices too. Very professional, convenient hours, and friendly.

originalText.text: This establishment has been in the area for about 40 yrs (give or take a few yrs). There is something comforting about that. They've always been nice. One time I had the a bright idea to purchase a white North Face for winter...a nyc winter lol. It was pretty filthy, dull and grey by the end of the season. I explained to the lady behind the counter what happened. She laughed. Then I laughed. And then she proceeded to scold me lol. Anyways it's a nice neighborhood business.Good folks that know their craft.

text.text: This establishment has been in the area for about 40 yrs (give or take a few yrs). There is something comforting about that. They've always been nice. One time I had the a bright idea to purchase a white North Face for winter...a nyc winter lol. It was pretty filthy, dull and grey by the end of the season. originalText.text:
One of the best cleaners and tailors I have ever been to. Kim is friendly, professional, and compassionate. She does a quality job in no time. The prices are competitive. I’ve brought my favorite pieces to Monarch for both dry cleaning and tailoring and never have left disappointed.

A short story. Once, I got makeup on a silk dress I was supposed to wear to a party. Two big ugly stains of foundation. I rushed it over to Monarch and she took it quickly to the back and got rid of the stains. When I asked her how much I owed her, she said, “no charge.”

text.text:
One of the best cleaners and tailors I have ever been to. Kim is friendly, professional, and compassionate. She does a quality job in no time. The prices are competitive. I’ve brought my favorite pieces to Monarch for both dry cleaning and tailoring and never have left disappointed.

A short story. Once, I got makeup on a silk dress I was supposed to wear to a party. Two big ugly stains of foundation. I rushed it over to Monarch and she took it quickly to the back and got rid of the stains. When I asked her how much I owed her, she said, “no charge.”

originalText.text: It can not be better service. I dropped 2 suits and they promised to have them ready for the next 24 hrs. Next day the  job was done as expected.
